short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that can provide you with different opinions and bring you out of echo chambers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DeBubble system helps users to analyze their reading history, and provide them with additional information to diversify their readings. As compared to general news aggregators system that only recommend the similar items to read, DeBubble recommends the similar articles from different point of views so that users can diversify their reading. Users can also keep track of their readings, based on the topics and articles.
